Projects.title: PARVENETTA
desc: PARVENETTA lets you create your suit and apparel right in front of you — from jacket to pant and from T-shirt to hoodie — by selecting fabric, lapels, buttons, pockets, stitching, and more in an intuitive live configurator.

A second module, Build Your Brand, enables end-to-end customization of apparel like T‑shirts, hoodies, and zip hoodies — including pockets, trims, panel placements, and top-stitching — through a comprehensive nine‑step process.
Designed to streamline bespoke tailoring and private‑label production with a modern, visual experience for both individual shoppers and brands.

Projects.title: Client Personal Portfolio Website
desc: A personal portfolio website for a graphic designer that I created for a client. The website is built using two main tech, Next.js, Javascript, TailwindCSS. The website also created based on the client design, and improved and sliced by me. The website has a few features such as a about page, a project page, resume page, and a contact page.
The website is created using a modern design and a clean interface that appeals to a wide audience.

Projects.title: YB Consultants
desc: YB Consultants is a smart education consultancy platform that streamlines the university application journey for students. Through the website, students can register for their desired university and course, upload personal and academic documents, and track their application status in real time. The platform also features a university search engine, allowing students to filter by country, department, and intake period to find institutions they are eligible for—making the entire admission process easier, faster, and more transparent.

Projects.title: Business Fest 2024
desc: I, along with my teammate Abdullah Shakur, designed and developed a full-stack web application for our university’s flagship event, Business Fest. The platform featured a student portal with sign-up/sign-in and stall registration, integrated OpenAI’s LLM to auto-evaluate stall ideas with constructive feedback, and provided a stall evaluation system for teachers and judges based on ten predefined criteria. We also created an admin dashboard to manage student, guest, and Qawali night registrations while enabling real-time monitoring of stall evaluation results.

Projects.title: Lane View Driving School Web App
desc: I developed a web application for Lane View Driving School using Next.js and Express.js. As the front-end developer, I designed and built the index page, hourly courses page, and intensive courses display page. The platform included an Admin Portal to manage and track user registrations, postal code-based filtering to display matched hourly courses, and Stripe integration for secure payment processing.

Projects.title: Data Analytics Dashboard
desc: I designed and maintained comprehensive Power BI dashboards covering student registration, enrollment, multi-institute attendance, placements, trainer performance, and feedback analysis. I built robust ETL pipelines to clean, transform, and integrate data from diverse sources such as Excel, SQL, and institutional records. My work included developing KPIs and performance metrics to track training effectiveness, placement success rates, and institute-wise performance. I also automated attendance and enrollment reporting across institutes to improve decision-making and transparency, while delivering actionable insights to stakeholders for program monitoring and policy improvements.
